word_mean: 成线法：排列成线，呈线样排列
排列：牙科指天然牙或假牙排列成行，以在牙弓上形成两条规则的抛物线，从而为支持结构与对侧牙列间重建协调关系
又称“排比”。根据两个或多个的核苷酸序列的重合部分，找出序列结构变化的差错、插入、缺省和交换部分。
又称“排比”。DNA或蛋白质的等位位点上的核苷酸或氨基酸的比较。

sentence.Network_en: The Afro-Asian nations had approved the basic general principles of non-alignment.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚非国家已经同意了不结盟的基本通则。

sentence.Network_en: His increasing alignment with the Reagan administration nearly cost him re-election.
sentence.Network_cn: 与里根政府日益紧密的关系差点让他失去了连任的机会。

sentence.Network_en: A bone in my spine was out of alignment .
sentence.Network_cn: 我的脊椎骨有一节脱位。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 光刻_百度百科 ... 软烘（ Soft Baking） 对准（alignment）（ Alignment） 硬烘（ Hard Baking）.
人脸校准（Alignment）——这个模块试图对脸部“组件”（眼睛、眉毛、嘴、鼻等）进行定位，并返回这些“组件”的中心点或者轮廓数据 …
大学英语竞赛本科词汇_百度文库 ... alien a 外国的，外国人 alignment 队列，结盟，联合 allied 联合的，联姻的.
全局比对(Alignment ) • 两个序列的全局对就是要找出一种在两个序列中分别加入一些‘插入’位置使得这两个序列能够‘符合的位数最大。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French alignement, from aligner (see align)

entry.def: An alignment is support for a particular group, especially in politics, or for a side in a quarrel or struggle.

example.ex: The church should have no political alignment...
His increasing alignment with the Reagan administration nearly cost him re-election.
example.tran: 与里根政府日益紧密的关系差点让他失去了连任的机会。

entry.def: The alignment of something is its position in relation to something else or to its correct position.

example.ex: ...the alignment of mirrors in the telescope.

means.word_mean: 1. an organization of people (or countries) involved in a pact or treaty
2. the spatial property possessed by an arrangement or position of things in a straight line or in parallel lines
3. (astronomy) apparent meeting or passing of two or more celestial bodies in the same degree of the zodiac
4. the act of adjusting or aligning the parts of a device in relation to each other
